kpi.name: RNC_704a
kpi.formula: (rrc.cell_update_att_due_cell_res_1 + rrc.cell_update_att_per_update_1 + rrc.cell_update_att_data_transm_1 + rrc.cell_update_att_paging_resp_1 + rrc.cell_upd_att_re_ent_s_area_1 + rrc.cell_update_att_r_link_fail_1 + rrc.cell_update_att_rlc_err_1)

kpi_info.title: Total Number of Cell Update messages
kpi_info.use: The total number of received Cell Update messages
kpi_info.formula:
sum(CELL_UPDATE_ATT_DUE_CELL_RES
+ CELL_UPDATE_ATT_PER_UPDATE
+ CELL_UPDATE_ATT_DATA_TRANSM
+ CELL_UPDATE_ATT_PAGING_RESP
+ CELL_UPD_ATT_RE_ENT_S_AREA
+ CELL_UPDATE_ATT_R_LINK_FAIL
+ CELL_UPDATE_ATT_RLC_ERR)

kpi.kpi_alias: Total Number of Cell Update messages
